cmd:
import json, os, sys
if os.path.exists(sys.argv[1]) and os.path.isdir(sys.argv[1]):
  with open(sys.argv[2], 'w') as f:
    json.dump(os.listdir(sys.argv[1]), f)
name: listdir fake dir

cmd:
import sys, os
path = sys.argv[1]
mode = int(sys.argv[2])
if not os.path.isdir(path):
  if os.path.exists(path):
    print "%s exists but is not a dir" % path
    sys.exit(1)
  os.makedirs(path, mode)
name: makedirs makedirs
~followup_annotations: @@@STEP_LOG_LINE@python.inline@    print "%s exists but is not a dir" % path@@@

import shutil
import sys
shutil.copytree(sys.argv[1], sys.argv[2], symlinks=bool(sys.argv[3]))

cmd:
import glob
import sys
with open(sys.argv[1], 'w') as f:
  f.write('\n'.join(glob.glob(sys.argv[2])))
name: glob

name: rmtree cleanup
